p.s: Do you remember your opinion on students exchanges?
You once told me that you think student exchanges are a waste of time and I would like to tell you my opinion.
In my opinion student exchanges are not a wastwaste of time.
First of all you can see another country where you maybe work later and get some experience by making friends and talking to the people.
Another point is that you will learn a new language or increase your language skills in another way than by a teacher or the internet.
As a final point it will look good on an application if you traveledtravelled and lived in another country, because you may have to travel a lot in your future job.
I hope that I could change your opinion and maybe we will once study abroad together.
